content: Welcome to Nervosa, one of the most prestigious guilds in Ragnarok Online. Founded in 2024 by dedicated players, our guild has grown into a tight-knit community of skilled adventurers who support and help each other grow.

Our mission is to create a welcoming environment for players to grow, learn, and conquer challenges together while maintaining a strong sense of community and friendship. We believe in teamwork, respect, and continuous improvement.
Our core values include: Respect for all members, Active participation in guild activities, Supporting fellow guild members, and Maintaining a positive and friendly atmosphere.
